attributes.action: England wants Ricky Ponting Ashes recall
attributes.additional_details: The only thing more satisfying than England's forthcoming 5-0 Ashes series win would be if Ricky Ponting was playing. If that was the case, the score might be 4-1. If Australian selectors are too proud to recall Ponting (who is currently averaging 98), then perhaps 1000s of English signatures to recall Ricky might give them a nudge.
